K10D0187_H0188:300a-4: zhugs shing skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
K10D0187_H0188:300a-5: cad rtogs shing rig nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
K10D0187_H0188:300a-6: thar pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
K10D0187_H0188:300a-7: rnyes pa ste / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
K10D0187_H0188:300a-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
K10D0187_H0188:300a-9: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0187_H0188:300a-10: rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad
K10D0187_H0188:300a-11: med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o //
K10D0187_H0188:300a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste /
K10D0187_H0188:300a-14: bcu gang zhe na; rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig
K10D0187_H0188:300a-15: la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
K10D0187_H0188:300a-16: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa
K10D0187_H0188:300a-17: dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod
K10D0187_H0188:300a-18: du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi
K10D0187_H0188:300a-19: 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par thar pa
K10D0187_H0188:300a-20: dang / dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig
K10D0187_H0188:300a-21: la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
K10D0187_H0188:300a-22: sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa
K10D0187_H0188:300a-23: ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300a-24: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med
K10D0187_H0188:300a-25: pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam
K10D0187_H0188:300b-1: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-3: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-4: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-6: da ltar byung zhing brje ba rnam par thar pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-7: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-9: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-10: rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-11: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-13: da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-14: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-16: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste /
K10D0187_H0188:300b-18: 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu'o //
K10D0187_H0188:300b-19: snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las /
